001    package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002    
003    
004    /**
005     * IEventListener is common interface for event listeners.
006     */
007    public abstract interface IEventListener {
008            
009            /**
010             * This is the callback function that should be registered using addEventListener().
011             * When the event occurs, this function will be called.
012             * 
013             * @param event the IEvent object returned to the listener
014             */
015            public void run(IEvent event);
016    }
